name: Swan Forest
description:
Swan Forest has fallen into ruin, and you are its last hope. Can you help your fellow subjects, reach the King, and convince him to release Swan Forest from his iron grip?

A short, simple adventure-exploration game, with 10 possible ways to get 2 possible endings!!

I didn’t make the compo deadline, but all art, audio, writing, scripting, etc. was done by me within 48 hours, aside from the UI art assets and fonts which are part of the engine/art programs that I used.

Controls:

  • wasd/arrow keys to move
  • z to interact
